subject: handbrake control device
description_text:
﻿
Hi. I'd like to know if it's possible to purchase a separate handbrake control unit? Mine was damaged and the handbrake doesn't work without it. Regards.

conversations.body_text: Hi Kontoxboxone098,  Please provide the order number, along with photos of the control box and the product itself, so we can further verify the issue for you.

I don't have the order number. I bought the handbrake used from an
individual. I've attached a photo showing which handbrake I'm talking
about.



W dniu pon., 24 lis 2025 o 08:32 service@simsonn.com

Hi Kontoxboxone098,  The control unit is generally very robust. Please try opening Freejoy 1.7.0 and check if it can successfully connect to the control unit.            https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link

This isn't a software issue. The Control Box was physically damaged.
The dog chewed it up. In fact, it's in pieces.



W dniu pon., 24 lis 2025 o 09:26 service@simsonn.com
Hi Kontoxboxone098,    You can make your purchase at this link. The total cost, including shipping, is $25.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

Thank you for your help. Ordered.



W dniu pon., 24 lis 2025 o 12:04 service@simsonn.com
Hi Kontoxboxone098,    Alright, we'll ship your order as soon as possible.
Hi Kontoxboxone098,    Please provide your phone number and confirm whether your address information is complete.  Jarosław Bukowski  Główna  65  58-371 Jabłów  Poland

The data is correct. Phone number: +48 537766068



W dniu wt., 25 lis 2025 o 12:21 service@simsonn.com
Hi Kontoxboxone098,    Here you go, this is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2533200709718918
